scoringmanagement

Class Invoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • scoringmanagement.Invoker

  • public class Invoker
extends java.lang.Object
    The Invoker class handles compilation, execution, and file output for submitted lab files Full execution of the class allows for a java file to be compiled, executed, and for the console output to be logged in a log file
    Version:
    June 4
    Author:
    Max & Darshan

      static boolean compileLab(java.lang.String labName, java.lang.String labFile)
      The compileLab method takes in lab submission data (LabName, and LabFiles) A directory is setup such as below that sandboxes each run within the user's unique directory.
      static void outputConsole()
      Sets the Output Stream to be linked to a txt file instead of console
      static boolean runProgram(java.lang.String classFileName)
      Runs the program inputted and outputs into a txt file Modified from: https://github.com/AlmasB/CodeSamplesJava/blob/master/src/demo/InvokerDemo.java

    • Method Detail

      • compileLab

        public static boolean compileLab(java.lang.String labName,
                                 java.lang.String labFile)
        The compileLab method takes in lab submission data (LabName, and LabFiles) A directory is setup such as below that sandboxes each run within the user's unique directory. Value returned determines if the program was able to compile the file(s) or not Compilation of the student's labs is done by the Java provided library --> https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/javax/tools/JavaCompiler.html Compilation section is forked from ---> https://github.com/0416354917/Algorithms/blob/master/src/util/InlineCompiler.java Sample Directory: Set Directory --> temp ---> .txt ---> .java
        Parameters:
        String - labName
        String - labFile

      • runProgram

        public static boolean runProgram(java.lang.String classFileName)
        Runs the program inputted and outputs into a txt file Modified from: https://github.com/AlmasB/CodeSamplesJava/blob/master/src/demo/InvokerDemo.java
        Parameters:
        String - classFileName
        String - labName

      • outputConsole

        public static void outputConsole()
        Sets the Output Stream to be linked to a txt file instead of console
        Parameters:
        int - trialNum - Sets the txt file name
